completeListOfAbilities.name: Terra Homing
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
3-hit group 聖 magic BRV attack + group HP attack
BRV attacks distributed based on number of enemies
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of individual MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
All targets: 4 turns 聖 Resist Down
Self: 4 turns Double White
HP Attack、 HP Attack+ becomes Double Holy while Double White active

ailments.name: Double White
ailments.desc: Double White: Restores a certain amount of BRV

ailments.name: PO Resist Down
ailments.desc: 聖 Resist Down: Lowers 聖 resist (does not stack)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Double Holy
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit 聖 magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times
Increases BRV based on INT BRV before second attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Cancels Double White

passives.name: HP Regen Extension
passives.desc:
When using HP Regen:
 • Tremendous boost to BRV granted based on own INT BRV
 • 12 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up、 ATK Up to party
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use (moderately restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of individual MAX HP; HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV)

HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (slightly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP) with active buff
passives.short_desc: HP Regen Extension: Boost to HP Regen

passives.name: All Buffed Attack Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buffed Attack Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Smite Extension
passives.desc:
Smite use +2

When using Smite:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit 聖 magic BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own ATK) with active buff
passives.short_desc: Smite Extension: Boost to Smite

passive.short_desc: Ability Recovery All Attack Growth: Boost to Ability Recovery All Attack

passives.name: Memories with Mog Extension Attack Boost Up++
passives.desc:
While equipping EX+ weapon Tiger Racket (IX)+ or passive ability Memories with Mog Extension:
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK

HP Attack、 HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (聖 magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slightly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of individual MAX HP) with active buff
passives.short_desc: Memories with Mog Extension Attack Boost Up++: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK; enables HP Attack++ with active buff

passives.name: Terra Homing Recast MAX HP Regen Buff Starting

passives.name: Terra Homing Double Holy BRV Hit Plus Force Advance

 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

When using Double Holy:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Terra Homing Double Holy BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Terra Homing
